param.name: infile
param.label: Nucleotide Sequence in FASTA format

param.name: wins
param.label: A list of window sizes to use
param.help: if none are given, then the entire sequence is taken with no windows. Each window > 1 required! Example: 50,100,200. (-wins)

param.name: t
param.label: The shape type (RNAshapes types from 1-5)
param.help: With the list format, the shape level can be changed for different window length '4=100' means that shape level 4 is used from length 100nt (window length) The first given length has to be 0! Not continuous given levels are allowed! (-t)

param.name: shift
param.label: The shift of the window, relative to the window size given in percent
param.help: Example 20 % of a window 150 would result in a step size of 30 nt. It is a relative parameter, as you can give different window sizes. Default shift of 1 nt. (-shift)

param.name: cue
param.label: Crop unpaired ends
param.help: If you give this flag, then the unpaired ends of each single structure are ignored. E.g. the structure ...(((...))).. becomes just (((...))). (-cue)

param.name: stack
param.label: Adds stacking information to graphs
param.help: This adds an additional vertex (type P) for each pair of stacked base-pairs and four edges (type p) from each of the involved bases to the new vertex. (-stack)

param.name: energy_opts_selector
param.label: Energy calculation mode
param.option: Relative energy range, i.e. percentage (%) of MFE energy (RNAshapes)

param.name: e
param.label: Energy range in kcal/mol (RNAshapes)

param.name: c
param.label: Relative energy range, i.e. percentage (%) of MFE energy (RNAshapes)

param.name: M
param.label: Max number of shreps that should be taken per window

param.name: u
param.label: Ignore unstable RNAshapes
param.help: This option filters out closed structures with positive free energy. (-u)

param.name: r
param.label: Calculate structure probabilities for RNAshapes

param.name: structure_sampling_opts_selector
param.label: Structure Sampling

param.name: i
param.label: Number of sampling iterations

param.name: smaple_len
param.label: Sampling is only used for seqs/windows >= given length

param.name: q
param.label: Turn on shape probabilities for RNAshapes, no sampling mode allowed

param.name: Tp
param.label: Filter cutoff for shape probabilities, applied before -M filter!

param.name: seq_graph_win
param.label: Add for each window a graph which contains no structure

param.name: seq_graph_t
param.label: add for each 't #' a graph which contains no structure

param.name: seq_graph_alph
param.label: Change the alphabet of unstructured graphs

param.name: annotate_infile
param.label: A file with annotations to be added as abstract graphs
param.help: The format is has the following TAB-delimited columns: SEQID, START, END, NAMESPACE#LABEL. Labels with the same name-space and SEQID form connected components, which is a sequence of label vertices ordered by the START position in the sequence.

param.name: abstr
param.label: Add abstract structure graphs to the single shrep graph instances

param.name: nostr
param.label: Calculate no structures, only add sequence information

param.name: vp
param.label: Enable graph computation with viewpoints
param.help: svmsgdnspdk will center on those nucleotides that are given via capital letters and ignore those given as lowercase letters (-vp)

param.name: ignore_header
param.label: Don't write fasta id part after first space to gspan
